 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנוֺן‎</span> **noun masculine** dubious; only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאַחֲרִיתוֺ יִהְיֶה מ‎</span> [[Prov.29.21|Prov 29:21]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] ***thankless one*** (Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>189</sup>); [[BDB#De|De]] &quot;***Brutstätte***&quot; i.e. father of numerous progeny (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נון‎</span>); &lt; [[BDB#Be|Be]] [[BDB#Str|Str]] (who cites A. Müller), compare [[BDB#Wild|Wild]]., read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָדוֺן‎</span> ***strife***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנוֺס‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנוּסָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוס‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנוֺר‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ניר‎</span>.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנוֺרָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נור‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְּזָרִים‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נזר‎</span>.
